content:
Hi DevDays team,

in your email this afternoon you say, slides would be available before the session even. I cannot see them in Whova though and would love to look up certain points in some presentations. When will the slides be available in Whova?

Marco Wedekind said:

Hi DevDays team,

in your email this afternoon you say, slides would be available before the session even. I cannot see them in Whova though and would love to look up certain points in some presentations. When will the slides be available in Whova?

They are being uploaded now (todays sessions)
